title: Mögliche Lösung des 5.3 Client-Problems
body:
Ich habe ein wenig im Na und Eune Forum egstöbert und mehrere Posts gefunden, die bestätigen, dass dies hier helfen soll.

**!!!Wichtig!!!**
-Ich übernehme keine Verantwortung für mögliche Folgen
-Ich habe es selber nicht versucht weil ich keinen Bock drauf habe
-Sollte es funktionieren, sagt bitte bescheid sodass andere Spieler und auch Riot sehen kann ,dass es funktioniert

** !!! Lösung die manchen Na & Eune Spieler geholfen hat !!! **
Well i have updated my 5.3 patch successfully and i will show you how :

league of legends folder > RADS > projects > delete lol_launcher and restart the game it won't solve it yet .. then reboot your computer, start lol and let it just calculate differences for like 15~30 minutes and it'll start updating again and let me know if you got any further problems regarding the same problem.

Regarding the 0Kps Problem :
http://forums.eune.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=805663

Errors with installing the game ?
http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Installer/SingleFileInstall/LeagueOfLegendsBaseEUNE.exe

Okay, Those helped alot of people but some people still had some sort of problems Check the solutions below and good luck

1) Always run as Administrator.

2) Run this to update: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\lol.launcher.admin.exe .

3) Close LoLReplay (if you have it installed).

4) Change your server to NA and then back to EUNE/EUW.

5) Update Adobe Air and Internet Explorer and yea it'll help.

6) Download the latest Microsoft Visual C++ Package.

7) Download the latest Microsoft .Net Framework.

8) And Update the adobe flash player or download the latest version.

9) Allow inbound and outbound connection for LoL in your antivirus/firewall exception list.

10) If the above does not fix the problem completely disable your antivirus/firewall temporarily.

11) If the patch still does not apply, while your antivirus/firewall is disabled try to repair your client. The repair function can be found in the options menu.

12) Uninstall LoL -> Delete the game folder C:\Riot Games\League of Legends -> Redownload and install LoL again (prefer a different directory than before).

13) Delete all the "air" folders in Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects and try again.


Viel Glück und so {{champion:4}}
